Fighter, Rogue Your battle instincts make you more aware of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible] opponents.

Ranger Your heightened senses allow you to instinctively detect unseen opponents.

You don't need to succeed at a flat check to target concealed creatures. You're not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to creatures that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] from you (unless you're off-guard to them for reasons other than the hidden condition), and you need only a successful @Check[type:flat|dc:5] to target a hidden creature.

While you're adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] creature of your level or lower, it is instead only hidden from you.
